name: AS_CO_UT_convertDateToDateTime
description: Converts a date to the dateTime, maintaining the date value, and allows for optional hour, minute, second parameters
sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Datetime',
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!date),
    null,
    
    userdatetime(
      year(ri!date),
      month(ri!date),
      day(ri!date),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!userHour, replacementValue: 0),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!userMinute, replacementValue: 0),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(nullableValue: ri!userSecond, replacementValue: 0)
    )
  )
)
